# Data Analysis Helper

Perform statistical analysis on CSV data with beautiful visualizations.

## Getting Started

Load your dataset and run exploratory analysis:

```python
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("data.csv")
print(df.describe())
```

## Visualization

Create charts using matplotlib:

```python
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df.plot(kind="bar", x="category", y="value")
plt.savefig("chart.png")
```
